name: php-docblocker-coffeeio
description: A simple, dependency free PHP specific DocBlocking package
author: Mathias Grundtvig Andreasen <mgapcdev@gmail.com>

php-docblocker-coffeeio.gap.description: If there should be a gap between the description and tags

php-docblocker-coffeeio.returnGap.description: If there should be a gap between params and return

php-docblocker-coffeeio.returnVoid.description: Should we return void if there is no detectable return type?

php-docblocker-coffeeio.extra.description: Extra tags you wish to include in every DocBlock

php-docblocker-coffeeio.useShortNames.description: Whether you want to use int instead of integer and bool instead of boolean.

php-docblocker-coffeeio.qualifyClassName.description: Fully qualifies any data types used in param and returns by reading the namespaces.

php-docblocker-coffeeio.alignParams.description: Vertically aligns param types and names with additional spaces.

php-docblocker-coffeeio.alignReturn.description: Vertically aligns return with above param statements.

php-docblocker-coffeeio.functionTemplate.description: Specify the default template for functions.

php-docblocker-coffeeio.propertyTemplate.description: Specify the default template for class variables.

php-docblocker-coffeeio.classTemplate.description: Specify the default template for classes.
